text.*:
This is a list of podcasts that promote or practice scientific skepticism.[1][2][3]

Podcast Host(s) Started Ended Language Affiliation
15 Credibility Street[4] Sharon Hill October 17, 2016 English Doubtful News
Amateur Skeptics[5] Bryan, Ian, Jennifer, Shawn, Kimberly January 26, 2010 English Independent
Archaeological Fantasies[6][7] Sara Head, Kenneth Feder January 5, 2015 English The Archaeology Podcast Network
Be Reasonable[8][9] Michael Marshall (until June 2014 also Hayley M. Stevens[10]) January 28, 2013 English Merseyside Skeptics Society
Being Skeptical[11] Mark Langridge, Jody Tomchishen January 31, 2017 English Independent
Biskeptical[12][13] Trav Mamone, Morgan Stringer April 12, 2016 English Independent
Blurry Photos[14][15] David Flora, Dave Stecco August 28, 2012 English Independent
Body Of Evidence, The[16] Jonathan Jarry, Dr. Christopher Labos March 29, 2015 English Independent
Brainstorm Podcast[17] Cory, Mike, Lana, Destin, Raz, Rene November 9, 2013 English Independent
Caustic Soda[18] Toren Atkinson, Kevin Leeson, Joe Fulgham March 29, 2010 March 28, 2016 English Independent
Cognitive Dissonance[19][20] Cecil, Tom April 13, 2011 English Independent
Completely Unnecessary Skeptical Podcast, The[21] Nathan Grange, Siouxsie Wiles, Craig Shearer January 21, 2010 English Independent
Conspiracy Skeptic[3] Mamer, Karl October 22, 2007 English Independent
Data Skeptic[22][23] Kyle Polich May 23, 2014 English Independent
Dr Karl's Great Moments in Science[24] Karl Kruszelnicki April 24, 2012 English Australian Broadcasting Corporation, ABC Science
Edinburgh Skeptics Presents...[25] Mark Pentler, Claudia Schaffner, David Frank + Other Guests April 20, 2015 English Edinburgh Skeptics
For Good Reason[26] D. J. Grothe January 23, 2010 December 15, 2011 English James Randi Educational Foundation
Frightday[27][28] Byron McKoy, Kelly Jennifer, Sam Milo October 13, 2014 English Independent
Fysiopodden[29] Leo Huss-Wallin, William Valkeaoja, John Svensson, Jacob Sejersen och Henrik Lydén March 30, 2011 February 1, 2016 Swedish Independent
Geologic Podcast[3] George Hrab January 23, 2007 English Independent
Here and How, The[30] Thomas Westbrook, Stephen Woodford, Rachel Oates February 24, 2018 English Holy Koolaid LLC, Rationality Rules, Rachel Oates
Hoaxilla[31][32] Alexander Waschkau, Alexa Waschkau May 18, 2010 German Independent
Hunting Humbug 101[33] Theo Clark May 27, 2014 May 21, 2016 English Humbug! the eBook
Ikonokast[34] Mike Haubrich, Greg Laden 2016 (approx) English Independent
Imaginary Friends Show, The[35] Jake Farr-Wharton, Gregg Savage February 8, 2011 English Independent
InKredulous[8] Andy Wilson February 8, 2010 English Merseyside Skeptics Society
Inquiring Minds[36][37] Indre Viskontas, Kishore Hari September 20, 2013 English Climate Desk
Kritisch Denken[38] Jozef van Giel February 18, 2009 Dutch Independent
Kvack![39] David Björnfot, Frida, DoctorOHM October 17, 2011 Swedish Independent
Little Atoms[40] Neil Denny, Padraig Reidy, Richard Sanderson, Becky Hogge July 21, 2006 English The Skeptic until 2011, now independent
L’esploratore dell’insolito[41] Massimo Polidoro July 3, 2014 Italian Independent
Meet the Skeptics[42] Christopher Brown September 13, 2010 March 2, 2015 English Independent
MonsterTalk[43] Blake Smith, Ben Radford and Karen Stollznow July 2, 2009 English The Skeptics Society's Skeptic magazine
Nachgefragt Podcast[44] Michaela Voth April 23, 2017 German Independent
Ockham's Razor[45] Robyn Williams January 23, 2016 English Australian Broadcasting Corporation, Radio National
Oh No, Ross and Carrie![46] Ross Blocher, Carrie Poppy March 10, 2011 English Maximumfun.org
Pod Delusion, The[47] James O'Malley September 18, 2009 English British Humanist Association
Podcast Science[48] Alan, David, Julie, Nico, Robin, Jeanne, Marco and Mathieu September 1, 2010 French Independent
Point of Inquiry[3] D. J. Grothe, Chris Mooney, Robert M. Price, Karen Stollznow, Indre Viskontas, Lindsay Beyerstein, Josh Zepps, Paul Fidalgo December 11, 2005 English Center for Inquiry
Pseudoscientists, The[3] Jack Scanlan, Rachael Skerritt, Sarah McBride, Tom Lang, Belinda Nicholson December 23, 2008 July 15, 2015 English Young Australian Skeptics
Quackcast[3] Mark Crislip May 5, 2006 English Independent
Rationally Speaking[49][50] Massimo Pigliucci, Julia Galef February 1, 2010 English New York City Skeptics
Reality Check, The[3] Darren McKee, Adam Gardner, Elan Dubrofsky, Pat Roach, Christina Roach August 14, 2008 English Ottawa Skeptics
Saltklypa[51] Gunnar Tjomlid, Marit Simonsen, Kristin Carlsson October 11, 2010 Norwegian Independent[52]
Sceptici în România[53] Eddy Petrisor, Miruna Chelbea, Ovidiu Covaciu October 10, 2010 Romanian Independent
Scepticisme Scientifique[54] Jean-Michel Abrassart October 1, 2012 French Independent
Science for the People[55] Desiree Schell March 20, 2009 English Independent
Science Vs[56][57] Wendy Zukerman May 25, 2015 English Gimlet Media / ABC Radio First Run
Science Watch[58] Dave Thomas, M. Kim Johnson August 13, 2005 March 7, 2010 English New Mexicans for Science and Reason (NMSR)
Sensibly Speaking Podcast, The[59] Chris Shelton August 21, 2015 English Independent
ShelShocked[60] Sheldon Helms March 22, 2015 December 13, 2015 English Independent
Skeprechauns, The[61][62] Rebecca O'Neill, Fionnuala Murphy "Finn" October 3, 2012 October 9, 2014 English Dublin Skeptics
Skeptic Wire, The[63] Donna, Gary and Greg April 4, 2011 October 30, 2015 English Independent
Skeptic Zone, The[3] Richard Saunders September 26, 2008 English Independent[64]
Skepticality[3] Derek Colanduno, "Swoopy" Robynn McCarthy April 1, 2005 English The Skeptics Society's Skeptic magazine
Skeptically Challenged[65] Ross Balch June 2, 2013 June 25, 2015 English Independent
Skeptically Yours[66] Emery Emery, Heather Henderson July 29, 2012 English Independent
Skepticism Today[67] Dell Mitchell, Mark Honeychurch, Simon McAuliffe, Tim Atkin May 27, 2014 April 29, 2015 English Independent
Skepticrat, The[68][69] Noah Lugeons, Heath Enwright, Eli Bosnick January 26, 2016 English Puzzle in a Thunderstorm, LLC.[70]
Skeptics with a K[8] Mike Hall, Michael Marshall, Alice Howarth, Colin Harris September 1, 2009 English Merseyside Skeptics Society
Skeptics' Guide to the Universe, The[3] Steven Novella, Jay Novella, Robert Novella, Perry DeAngelis, Evan Bernstein, Rebecca Watson, Cara Santa Maria May 4, 2005 English New England Skeptical Society
Skepticule[71] Paul S. Jenkins, Paul Thompson, Paul Orton September 20, 2009 English Independent
Skeptikerpodden[72] Peter Dahlgren March 29, 2010 December 3, 2013 Swedish Independent
SkeptisCH[73] Marko Kovic, Tobias Füchslin August 5, 2012 German Skeptiker Schweiz
Skeptoid[3][74] Brian Dunning October 3, 2006 English Independent
Squaring the Strange[75] Ben Radford, Pascual Romero April 13, 2017 English Independent
Sisyphus Speaks: Reflections on Pseudo-Medicine[76] Mark Crislip September 24, 2016 English Society for Science-Based Medicine
TheESP – European Skeptics Podcast[77] Pontus Böckman (SE), Jelena Levin (LV), András G. Pintér (HU)[78] November 18, 2015 English Independent
Token Skeptic[79] Kylie Sturgess December 25, 2009 English Independent
Unfiltered Thoughts[80][81] Jack Scanlan September 26, 2013 March 30, 2015 English Young Australian Skeptics
Virtual Skeptics[82] Brian Gregory, Bob Blaskiewicz, Tim Farley, Sharon A. Hill, Eve Siebert August 15, 2012 English Independent
VoFcast[83] Joacim Jonsson April 6, 2011 January 21, 2012 Swedish Vetenskap och Folkbildning
You Are Not So Smart[84] David McRaney April 24, 2012 English Independent
Скептик (Skeptik)[85] Kirill Alferov, Levon Gulnazaryan, Ilya Makarov, Ekaterina Zvereva, Laida Kushnareva, Valery Sobolev June 20, 2013 Russian Skeptic Society (Общество скептиков)
